text: At the time of purchase, I was looking for an affordable cat litter that would give the most bang for your buck. Boy, this product showed to have nothing valuable in exchange for the price. My cat is good about wiping his paws off almost all the way before he leaves the rubber mat that his litter box is on. But this product, was terrible. He could go for one use after just cleaning his box and sweeping the floors, and within 10 minutes it would look like a sandstorm came through the room. I was sweeping the room at minimum twice a day, justifying a purchase of a slightly more expensive litter. In fact, I was so let down by this product, that the next bag I bought was the opposite end of the spectrum- at $30 for a bag of the same weight. And I couldn't be happier. This new litter actually clumps, doesn't amplify the smell, doesn't end up in every nook and cranny of the house, and requires far less litter box maintenance-all things that Purina must have wanted to avoid when deciding to make this product. I was always hesitant to purchase anything with the name Purina on it, due to their dismal and unethical practices when it comes to pet food (when it comes to fillers, use of other pets or roadkill, and chemicals that hurts your cats health), but when looking to save a buck or two, I figured "how could litter be anything like the same-litter's litter". This litter is just as disappointing as their food- the only difference is that their food will harm my animal and the litter harms my mental health and sanity. Purina should dissolve and stop getting their products into the hands of pet owners, who love and care about their pets.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 26 de marzo de 2025
title: Be Ready To Clean Your Floors.....Constantly.

text: The worst cat litter ever!!!!! It started smelling so bad that I thought my kittens were sick. We spent two weeks trying to treat them because the litter box had a terrible odor. Turns out the cat was completely healthy we just needed to switch to a different brand of litter. I do not recommend it!!!!!!

title: Horrible!!!!!
